alert.note: Alert for Bartholomew; Brown; Greene; Jackson; Lawrence; Monroe (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 5:14PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Monroe, southern Brown, west central Bartholomew, east central Greene, northern Lawrence and northwestern Jackson Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 514 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Nashville to 12 miles east of Bloomfield. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Nashville around 520 PM EDT. This includes Interstate 65 between mile markers 66 and 69. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for central, south central and southwestern Indiana.

area.areaDesc: Bartholomew; Brown; Greene; Jackson; Lawrence; Monroe
